requirement.notInOurSupportServer: This command can be used in DM, but it is required that you are joined to our official xToP Bot support server!
requirement.dmNotAllowed: This command is not allowed to be used in DM.
requirement.botChannelPermissionsMissing: The **bot permissions** for this **channel** are missing. Please check `{{bot.channel.permissions.missing}}`
requirement.botGuildPermissionsMissing: The **bot permissions** for this **guild** are missing. Please check `{{bot.guild.permissions.missing}}`
requirement.memberChannelPermissionsMissing: **Member permissions** for this **channel** are missing. Please check `{{member.channel.permissions.missing}}` **(requires only one of the permissions listed)**
requirement.memberGuildPermissionsMissing: **Member permissions** for this **guild** are missing. Please check `{{member.channel.permissions.missing}}` **(requires only one of the permissions listed)**

helpdesk.title: Help Desk
helpdesk.thereNoPublishedArticle: I did not find any published article

embeds.title: {{article.localization.title}}
embeds.description: {{article.localization.description}}

buttons: Did this article resolve the issue?

embeds.title: 🌐 Choose the language you prefer
embeds.description: Choosing your preferred language opens language-related channels for you in the official **xToP Bot** support server.

embeds.title: We haven't seen any subscriptions you've made.
embeds.description:
[Check out our Patreon page to get one of the subscription plans.](https://www.patreon.com/xtopbot)

If you subscribed and haven't linked your Discord account to your Patreon account, you **must**. Check [How do I connect Discord to Patreon? (Patron)](https://support.patreon.com/hc/en-us/articles/212052266-How-do-I-connect-Discord-to-Patreon-Patron-) complete the steps, click on the `sync` button below and enter your **Patreon email** you have subscribed to.
This subscription tier is unknown, or has been removed.

embeds.title: Your subscription has expired
embeds.description: Subscription to **{{subscription.tier.name}}** has expired on <t:{{subscription.expiredTimestamp}}:D>, you must pay for the renewal of the subscription via [Patreon]({{subscription.tier.checkout.url}})
You have reached the limit to create a custom bot in **{{subscription.tier.name}}** tier.

embeds.title: {{subscription.tier.name}}
embeds.description: {{subscription.description}}

options.description: The bot is not setup yet!
The bot token is valid, the bot works normally.
The bot token is invalid, you should set it up again!
The bot token is valid, and it is offline.

embeds.description: The bot is no longer available for you.

validations.ownedByUser: The bot owner must be owned by you.
validations.public:
The bot must be **unpublic**. 

To make your bot unpublic go to [`Application` → `Bot`](https://discord.com/developers/applications/{{bot.id}}/bot) and make `PUBLIC BOT` disabled.
validations.messageContentIntent:
The bot must be enable **Message Content Intent**. 

To enable **Message Content Intent** go to [`Application` → `Bot`](https://discord.com/developers/applications/{{bot.id}}/bot) and make `MESSAGE CONTENT INTENT` enabled.
validations.maximumServers: The bot must have **3** or fewer servers.

embeds.title: Custom Bot Setup Completed!
embeds.description:
**{{bot.tag}}** ({{bot.shortUUID}}) has been added to `{{subscription.tier.name}}` subscription and our operating system. You can now start your custom bot!

If you encounter operational or other problems, don't hesitate to ask for assistance in the helpdesk channel!

embeds.title: Custom Bot Setup
embeds.description:
Follow these steps to get your bot token:
Go to [`Discord Developer Portal`](https://discord.com/developers/applications) → `Applications` → `New Application` → `Bot` → `Add bot` → `Reset Token` → `Copy Token`

embeds.title: Successfully Terminated!
embeds.description: You are **{{bot.tag}}** (`{{custom.bot.id.short}}`) custom bot has been terminated!

embeds.title: This Action Cannot Be Undone!
embeds.description: You are requesting the termination of **{{bot.tag}}** (`{{custom.bot.id.short}}`) custom bot. Are you sure you want to continue processing this action?

embeds.title: It must be terminated!
embeds.description: Since the bot token is invalid or a custom bot validation fails according to the case of our custom bot terms, you must **terminate** and setup your custom bot with another valid token again!

embeds.title: Alert!
embeds.description: Your bot **{{bot.tag}}** ({{custom.bot.id.short}}) maxed out the servers limit `{{custom.bot.allowed.servers}}`.

footer.text: If you want to manage your bot servers, click the button below!

embeds.title: Manage your custom bot
embeds.description: This bot can be added to a maximum of `{{custom.bot.allowed.servers}}` or fewer servers.

selectMenu.placeholder: Select the servers you want to leave from
Select the bot status you prefer
Select the type of activity and add a describe

textInput.label: token
textInput.placeholder: Copy your bot token from Discord Developer Portal

tierDescription.7764503: In this subscription, there is `1` **Custom Bot** that can be entered into a maximum of `3` **Servers**.

fields.value: Tags can be useful if there are other similar titles or words related to this article to help customers find the article faster.

textInput.placeholder: What should customers know about this article?

embeds.description: {{article.note}}

fields.name: Info
fields.value: Staff can create localization of your article!

textInput.label: Note
textInput.placeholder: Tell the staff what they need to know about your article

embeds.title: Article Successfully Created!
embeds.description: You can create as many localizations of this article as is available. It is not recommended to create articles with a pre-existing topic!

textInput.label: Note
textInput.placeholder: Tell the staff what they need to know about your article

pluginRequiredUserLocale.content: This action requires that you select one of the available languages.

serverNotMeetPluginCriteria.content: This server does not meet the criteria for this plugin. Please contact the bot developer

interactionOnly.content: Hey {{user.tag}}, This channel is for **Slash Command** only, you cannot use regular command or start conversation.

exceededLimitation.content: You've created too many requests that haven't been accepted or you've exceeded your assistant request limit on this day!

warning.content:
Hey <@{{user.id}}>,
You seems are sending message in the wrong thread. Head to your thread <#{{active.thread.id}}> and start sending message there!

timeout.content:
Hey <@{{user.id}}>,
You have sent a lot of messages on thread that is not yours! I had to timeout you for a while. (Your thread has been closed due to your bad behavior)

embeds.title: Assistant Request Created!
embeds.description: Looking for an available assistant... **(Wait time: {{request.expires.in.minutes}} minutes)**

embeds.title: Incoming Request Needs Assistance!
embeds.description: {{request.issue}}

embeds.title: Assistant Request Was Canceled By You

followUp.content: We're sorry that assistants are not available to help you at this time. Come back another time Thank you for your understanding

embeds.title: Assistant Request Accepted!
embeds.description: <@{{assistant.id}}> came to help you!

footer.text:
Request Id: {{request.uuid}}
Would you mind taking a minute to tell us how we did? (Available when thread is closed)

followUp.content: Hey <@{{requester.id}}>, your request has been accepted by <@{{assistant.id}}>, please go to <#{{thread.id}}> thread and specify your issue in detail.!

embeds.title: Assistant Request Accepted By {{assistant.tag}}!
embeds.description: {{request.issue}}

options.label: Inactive
options.description: Customer was inactive for over a minute

followUp.content:
**Request Accepted Successfully.** 
Go to <#{{thread.id}}> thread and assistance the customer!

activeThread.content: You have an active thread in the assistance channel, please contact technical support through <#{{thread.id}}>

interaction.content:
**Would you mind taking a minute to tell us how we did?**
just two quick questions if you don't mind.
You left the thread and no assistant came to help you with your issue. Can you provide a reason for leaving the thread?

thread.content: How would you rate your overall thread experience with **{{assistant.tag}}**?

service.content: How satisfied are you with our services?

embeds.title: Welcome to the XTOP BOT Support Server!

set.content: English language has been set. You will be shown the helpdesk channel and it will be presented in English.
